text:
i know what you're going 
to say you are going to say
mr duncan you are late how dare you be late
well don't worry i have a very good excuse

maybe one of the best excuses 
ever in the history of excuses

here we go yes we are back together again and 
i'm feeling a little sensitive at the moment

for a very good reason i've just returned from 
the dentist and i have had a lot of treatment

done including a local anaesthetic which 
has made part of my mouth go very numb

here we go then yes we are back 
together it's english addict

and we have lots of special live streams during 
october to celebrate my 15th year here on youtube

first of all i have to say if you want to have 
live captions yes i'm not joking we now have

live captions all you have to do is press c on 
your keyboard not on the live chat just press

c on your keyboard or click subtitles or captions 
and you will have live captions i can't believe it

we have live subtitles they have returned 
and all i can say is it's about time

i've been waiting for two and a half years for the 
captions to return i don't look very well today

do i look strange on the camera 
i've just have a terrible experience

a very painful experience a very uncomfortable 
experience and that's just talking to mr steve

not not the dentist now i've been to the dentist 
this morning it took a little bit longer than i

expected not only that i decided to walk back home 
from town my mouth was really hurting throbbing

in fact and it still feels a little numb but 
also i have pain now that is starting to appear

right up here it's great i've never done 
this before i've never actually done

a live stream after returning from 
the dentist i do feel slightly

bewildered disorientated call it what you 
want but yes i feel a little strange today

we have live captions i can't i can't begin 
to tell you how happy i felt last night

i was so excited when i saw i had a 
little message come through from youtube

that said good news you can now have live 
captions on your live stream and i thought

great at least i have some good news to share 
with you the bad news is it feels as if i've been

having some sort of medieval torture because 
i went to the dentist to have some treatment

with the hygienist unfortunately i haven't 
been to the dentist for quite a while

so they had to do quite a lot of work the other 
thing is they couldn't use their special machine

that gets all of the horrible stuff from 
between your teeth they couldn't do that

because of covid so instead they had to do it the 
old-fashioned way with those horrible metal hooks

you can see them here on the screen i will 
show you so there they are can you see them

so these these here are what i 
had to suffer over the past hour

they were they were sticking those right into 
my gums and between my teeth they were scraping

gouging pulling and then the lady said i think 
i will have to give you some local anaesthetic

so i got a little bit worried because i thought 
maybe she was just going to hit me over the head

with a hammer like they used to do but she 
didn't she gave me a little injection up here

but now up on my my upper gums my 
upper teeth everything is numb but also

painful at the same time it is sort of throbbing 
oh would you like to see mr steve there's mr

steve by the way he will appear in a moment like 
this there he is it's mr steve he's just been

out for a quick walk and he's just returning 
from his little walk to the top of the hill

i'm so happy that we have captions i am i 
feel i feel very happy about that the only

problem i don't i don't like at the moment 
is the fact that i'm in pain from my dental

treatment come on mr steve give us a wave no i 
don't think he's going to steve doesn't realize

that he is actually on my camera at the 
moment but there he is returning from his

little walk i don't think i'm going 
to be on very long today because

i don't feel great i will be honest with you 
i'm i'm in quite a lot of pain at the moment

i know i should have gone to the dentist i should 
have gone a long time ago so maybe it is my own

fault i think so back to me i'm here i'm not 
sure if my teeth look better do they look better

i can't really tell to be honest i think 
they look cleaner but all i can say is it was

very painful what i had to go through so 
these things were were being used to clean

between my teeth they were like hooks sharp 
tools and they were scraping pulling gouging

that's the one that's the word i want to use 
gouge if you gouge something it means you are

using force to remove something from a tight space 
or a tight gap like between your teeth so so these

things horrible horrible things i think i prefer 
the other the other device that that that happens

very quickly so if you use the other device it 
does it much faster but but using using this set

of tools takes ages and it is very uncomfortable 
so i suppose it is my my my punishment for not

going to the dentist sooner and can you believe 
it after i went to the dentist i actually went

to the local cake shop not the baker's shop 
because that's closed it's gone it's closed down

i'm so shocked by that but i went to the cake shop 
in much wenlock and yes i did get a cake although

i'm not going to eat it just yet for obvious 
reasons so today i bought this lovely cake isn't

that nice i actually got two of them so one of 
them is for me and the other one is for mr steve

isn't that nice sponge so it's light sponge 
with some jam in the middle and you can see

on top there is a little bit of sugar as well so 
i'm not going to eat that at the moment because

i don't think i would enjoy it however later on 
i'm going to have this cake with a little bit of

custard so i'm going to heat this cake 
up in in the oven or in the microwave

and then i'm going to put a little bit of hot 
custard on the top and i think that is going to be

absolutely lovely i think that will take away 
the pain and the misery that i've been suffering

this morning at the hands of the dentist i don't 
like dentists one of the things that put me off

the dentist was many years ago when i was a child 
i had to go to the dentist to have some treatment

and they took 10 teeth out in one 
go at the same time all of them 10.

incredible so that that was a very traumatic 
experience and to be honest it did put me off

going to the dentist ever again i was not very 
happy about it and here i am now talking about

going to the dentist i'm not sure if this is 
cheering me up or not let me just take this away

be off with you so so i think my teeth 
maybe tomorrow morning when i wake up

perhaps i'll feel a little bit better 
tomorrow and my teeth will look like this
will be smiling brightly with my my clean teeth

anyway oh your your cake looks delicious thank 
you very much that's very kind of you to say

so the captions are back yes we have live 
captions right now not recorded captions

they are live so everything i'm saying 
now on here should appear underneath here

on the screen and all you have to do is 
activate the captions and you will have them

oh anyway i don't think i'm going to stay 
here very long to be honest with you because

i'm not feeling great i will be honest 
with you my my my face is really hurting

i think i might need to take some painkillers 
i i thought maybe this was a bad idea you see

and and perhaps perhaps it is anyway i shouldn't 
be too unhappy because we have made it all the way

to the end of another week because 
it's friday everyone friday
oh dear

and i don't think i'm going to 
stay here very long because i
i'm a little what's the word i'm looking for
i'm a little groggy i feel a little uncomfortable

i feel as if someone has has punched me in 
the face four or five times so that's what

it feels like so i haven't had any teeth 
taken out but i have had them cleaned

with the old-fashioned scrapers the scraping tools 
gouging and pulling i'm sure if claudia was here

because i know that claudia is not here today but 
apparently beatriz is also i think beatrice also

is having problems with her eyes beatrice 
what is happening to your eyes i have a

feeling it might be hay fever are you 
suffering at the moment from hay fever

are you suffering from the awful allergic 
reaction to the pollen and the leaves

and all of the grass and and everything that comes 
out and from the plants and flowers because i

think where you are it must be now springtime or 
early summer so i would imagine you are suffering

in the same way as i do when we have summer 
here because i get hay fever as well so i do

sympathize with you beatrice i hope you are 
feeling better take a rest make sure your

eyes stay relaxed i have allergic conjunctivitis 
that does not sound good so that is the surface

of your eye the clear surface and sometimes it can 
become inflamed or or infected for various reasons

especially if something goes into it and 
especially if your eyes are very sensitive

to that sort of thing so i'm sorry 
to hear that apparently mika in japan

left me a message this morning on facebook to 
tell me that she is okay after the earthquake

that took place yesterday there was a an 
earthquake i think it was about five was it 5.7

on the richter scale so first of all they 
thought it was much more serious but then

they they downgraded the earthquake so it wasn't 
actually as bad as they first thought we have

louis mendes is here as well 
thank you very much louis

dear thank you very much mr duncan this is 
very annoying indeed well i think it's more

annoying when you have no control over 
it so anything that you are allergic to

pollen certain types of food some 
people are allergic to types of material

so so they can't wear certain types of material 
next to their skin so so yes it can happen live

chat is here and well done vytas oh very nice vtas 
it is nice to see you here and you are back in

the top spot you are back at the top at number one 
you were first on today's very unusual live stream

to be honest with you i feel like going to 
bed i really do i feel like lying down in

a dark room hello tiksha hello mr duncan how 
was your time with the dentist i am late here

it wasn't very pleasant it was rather 
painful uncomfortable and and the dentist

used some very sharp tools there they are 
and she was putting them right into my teeth

right between right underneath and behind 
and in front and pulling and pushing

and it's my fault i i have to accept 
responsibility for this because

i haven't been to the dentist for a long time 
so so maybe partly it is my fault i think so

yes we do have live captions everyone you can 
click on the caption button you can click see

on your keyboard and you will get live captions 
i am so pleased to see the live captions have

returned so i am quite pleased about that to be 
honest don't forget i'm not with you tomorrow

i'm having tomorrow off fortunately but i won't be 
resting tomorrow because i'm going to see my mum

i'm going to visit my mummy and i haven't seen her 
for a while because she's being taken care of at

the moment in a care home and i'm going there 
tomorrow but i will be back with you on sunday

don't forget sunday 2pm uk time is when i will 
be with you so tomorrow not here sunday i am back

and of course as i mentioned earlier i am 
with you every day during october from monday

to friday as well so you have me six days a week 
can you believe it six days a week you have me

i'm not going to stay on too long because if 
i was honest with you i don't feel very well
i feel in a lot of pain

anchor i am also suffering from fever and pain 
in my leg so what is causing that what is causing

that and core i hope you feel better soon maybe 
you should rest your leg maybe you are putting

too much weight on your leg i don't know really 
because i'm not a doctor and i'm definitely not

a dentist i am not a dentist at all beatriz 
says i am glad for you mr duncan you will

visit your lovely mum yes i will be seeing my 
mother tomorrow and spending some time with her

thank you for your lovely messages today by 
the way i don't feel great but i couldn't let

you down i didn't want to let you down i thought 
no i should come on i should definitely be here

with you i should not neglect you even though i've 
just suffered lots of horrendous pain but i will

be back with you on sunday and i'm keeping 
this very short today i hope you don't mind

did you see that then did you 
see behind me there was some

some large tractors taking the hay from the 
field lots of bales of hay were going by just

did you see that it's very exciting there's always 
something going on here in the countryside so

i'm going in a moment i'm sorry that i can't 
be with you for much longer but i i need to

i need to wash my mouth and maybe have 
a lie down and take some painkillers

to try and get rid of all of this whatever is 
going on in my mouth at the moment i want it to go

away thank you very much for your company i know 
it's been only how long it's only been 23 minutes

normally it's much longer and for those 
wondering why there is a number 15 on my hat

it is because i am celebrating my 15 years 
on youtube this month so at the end of this

month it will be my anniversary and what 
i'm doing this month i'm actually here

monday to friday and sunday as well thank 
you for your lovely compliments about my hat

i'm going in a moment i really do need to take a 
rest i've had a busy morning for various reasons

thank you mr duncan for sparing a few minutes in 
your hard time it's okay it isn't too bad but it

is rather painful i know around the world there 
are much worse things happening around the world

so i suppose i should think that my problem is 
only a very small one and i shouldn't really

complain but it is uncomfortable all the 
same thank you beatriz thank you mr duncan

for your effort in spite of your annoying pain 
have a good rest yes i'm going now 25 minutes

is all i can spare today because i need to take 
a rest thank you very much for watching i hope

you've enjoyed this not the same as normal but 
i hope on sunday i will be feeling much better

thank you valentin stay stoic i will i will try 
to keep a stiff upper lip the only problem at the

moment is i can't feel my lip it's gone numb so 
unfortunately my my upper lip will not get stiff

thank you monica christina sheeran thank you very 
much vittorio i will see you on sunday 2 p.m uk

time this is just a short one and i hope it's been 
helpful even if all i've done is talk about my

my treatment this morning at the dentist catch 
you later this is mr duncan in the birthplace of

english saying thanks for watching see you very 
soon in fact i will be back on sunday 2 p.m uk

time and of course until the next time we meet 
here you know what's coming next yes you do
do they look cleaner do they look whiter i hope so
ta ta for now
